chain.name: A Puzzling Code
procedures: Talk to Kino Konoko in Zipangu: Mushroom Shrine.
Head over to Sleepywood and touch the Mysterious Statue.

chain.name: Second Code
procedures: Go to El Nath: Wolf Territory I and search for the Small Tomb.

chain.name: The Meaning of the Code
procedures: Return to Zipangu: Mushroom Shrine and talk to Kino Konoko.

chain.name: Umi's Spiced Veggies
rewards: Dark Scroll for Shoes for DEX 30% x 1
procedures: Talk to Umi in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Collect 80 Deep Buffoon's Rock Piece from Deep Buffoon.
Return to Umi after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Veggies are Awesome
procedures: Talk to Umi in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Collect 200 Bain's Spiky Collar from Bain.
Return to Umi after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Youthful Mariwaka
procedures: Talk to Mariwaka in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Hunt for 50 Sealed Bottle from Phantom Watch.
Return to Mariwaka after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Tae Sang's Request
procedures: Talk to Tae Sang in Mu Lung.
Head over to Herb Town and talk to Captain Hwang.

chain.name: An Evidence of Slaying the Captain
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for DEX 60% x 1
procedures: Hunt for 20 Hook from Captain.
Go back to Captain Hwang after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Carson's Experiment
procedures: Equip Zenumist's Cape.
Talk to Carson at Magatia: Zenumist Society.
Talk to Carson again to go to the Closed Lab.
Hunt Homun for a Magic Device and place it in the Pentagram of Alchemy at the center of the Closed Lab.
Take the Lightless Magic Device to Carson.

chain.name: Clue
procedures: Talk to Carson at Magatia: Zenumist Society.
Go to Magatia: Home of the Missing Alchemist and search for various writings in the house.
Go back to Carson and select the option about a pendant.

chain.name: Maed's Experiment
procedures: Equip Alcadno's Cape.
Talk to Maed at Magatia: Alcadno Society.
Eliminate 100 Homunculus.
Return and talk to Maed.

chain.name: Han the Broker's Info
procedures: Talk to Maed at Magatia: Alcadno Society.
Talk to Han the Broker and pay him 50,000 mesos.

chain.name: Dr. De Lang's Friend
procedures: Talk to Han the Broker in Sunset Road: Magatia again.
Find and talk to Eurek the Alchemist.

chain.name: What Parwen Knows
procedures: Talk to Parwen at Hidden Street: Authorized Personnel Only.
You will be transported to another map. Talk to Dr. De Lang.

chain.name: Dr. De Lang, the Missing Alchemist
procedures: Talk to Dr. De Lang.
Then talk to Parwen.

chain.name: Parwen's Pass
procedures: Talk to Parwen at Hidden Street: Authorized Personnel Only.
Hunt Saitie for 1 Parwen's Entry Pass.
Return to Parwen and talk to him.

chain.name: Searching for the Master Key
procedures: Talk to Parwen at Hidden Street: Authorized Personnel Only.
Hunt Saitie for 100 Entry Pass.
Return to Parwen and talk to him.

chain.name: Verifying the Password
procedures: Talk to Parwen at Hidden Street: Authorized Personnel Only.
Write down the code which he gives you - if you fail to recall this code later, you will have to forfeit the quest and start all over again.
Enter the password at the doors leading to the Hidden Street: The Unknown Underground Passage at Zenumist Research Institute: Lab - 1st Floor Hallway and Alcadno Research Institute: Lab - Area B-1.

chain.name: Romeo's Present
rewards: Must kill Angry Frankenroid, save Romeo or Juliet, and choose to help Yulete in order to get this quest.
procedures: Talk to Romeo at Magatia: Zenumist - Hidden Room.
Collect 20 May Mist by hunting Homunculus.
Return to Romeo and talk to him.

chain.name: Romeo's Flowers
procedures: Talk to Romeo and obtain Romeo's Snow Rose from him.
Give the rose to Juliet at Magatia: Alcadno - Hidden Room.

chain.name: Juliet's Feelings
procedures: Talk to Juliet at Magatia: Alcadno - Hidden Room.
Go to Ariant: The Town of Ariant and talk to Sirin.

chain.name: Sirin's Tailoring Methods
procedures: Talk to Sirin in Ariant: The Town of Ariant and get Sirin's Pattern from her.
Give the pattern to Juliet in Magatia: Alcadno - Hidden Room.

chain.name: Juliet's Response
procedures: Talk to Juliet at Magatia: Alcadno - Hidden Room and receive Juliet's Present from her.
Give the present to Romeo at Magatia: Zenumist - Hidden Room.

chain.name: Writing Romeo's Letter
procedures: Talk to Romeo at Magatia: Zenumist - Hidden Room.

Select the appropriate phrases to help him write the love letter:

Juliet, precious and beautiful
Looking at your starry eyes
Got my heart pounding like a wave of ocean
Bonding together like Yeti and Pepe
I'd like to spend the rest of my life being there for you
Juliet, precious and beautiful
Looking at your starry eyes
Got my heart pounding like a wave of ocean
Bonding together like Yeti and Pepe
I'd like to spend the rest of my life being there for you

chain.name: Romeo's Love Letter
procedures: Talk to Romeo at Magatia: Zenumist - Hidden Room and receive Romeo's Love Letter from him.
Give the letter to Juliet at Magatia: Alcadno - Hidden Room.

chain.name: Juliet is Impressed
procedures: Talk to Juliet at Magatia: Alcadno - Hidden Room.
Complete the following quest: Han the Broker's Recipe.
Give the Lunchbox Recipe to Juliet.

chain.name: Juliet's Lunchbox
procedures: Talk to Juliet at Magatia: Alcadno - Hidden Room and receive Juliet's Lunch Box from her.
Give the lunch box to Romeo at Magatia: Zenumist - Hidden Room.

chain.name: Parwen's Lab
procedures: Talk to Parwen at Hidden Street: Authorized Personnel Only.
Eliminate 200 Saitie.
Talk to Parwen again.

chain.name: Phyllia's Pendant
procedures: Talk to Phyllia in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Go to Dr. De Lang's House to get the Silver Pendant.
Return to Phyllia and talk to her again.

chain.name: Yulete's Request (Part 1)
procedures: Go to Magatia: Yulete's Lab located in the sewer in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Talk to Yulete.

chain.name: Making the Reagent
procedures: Talk to Yulete.
Enter the room on the left to Lab 1.

The following liquids should be dropped into the beaker in this order: 

Mysterious Red Liquid
Mysterious Green Liquid
Mysterious Yellow Liquid
Mysterious Blue Liquid
Mysterious Purple Liquid
Mysterious Red Liquid
Mysterious Green Liquid
Mysterious Yellow Liquid
Mysterious Blue Liquid
Mysterious Purple Liquid
Return to Yulete with the Finished Reagent and talk to him.

chain.name: Organizing the Lab Report
procedures: Talk to Yulete.
Enter the room on the left to Lab 2.
Click everywhere in the room to gather 20 Yulete's Report.
Return to Yulete and talk to him.

chain.name: Eliminating Obstacles
procedures: Talk to Yulete.
Enter the room on the left to Lab 3.
Kill 100 Obstacle Mutae.
Return to Yulete and talk to him.

chain.name: Yulete's Request (Part 2)
procedures: Once all of the above tasks have been completed, talk to Yulete.

chain.name: Han the Broker's Recipe
procedures: Talk to Han the Broker in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Pay him 20,000 mesos.

chain.name: Romeo Proposes
rewards: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Spear for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 60% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 60% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Bow for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Claw for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Pirate
Scroll for Gun for Attack 60% x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Romeo at Magatia: Zenumist - Hidden Room.
Complete the following quest: Allegro, the Master of the Rings.
Give Romeo's Engagement Ring to Romeo.

name: Allegro, the Master of the Rings

chain.name: Allegro, the Master of the Rings
procedures: Talk to Moony in Amoria.
Collect 2 Silver Plate and 2 Diamond and give them to him.

chain.name: Keeny's Research on D.Roid!!
rewards: This quest is repeatable every 3 days.
procedures: Talk to Keeny in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt D. Roy at Alcadno Research Institute: Lab - Area C-3 for 1 Broken Mechanical Heart.
Return to Keeny and talk to her.

chain.name: Yulete's Reward
rewards: You only get one reward, depending on how many marbles you give him.
This quest is not available after level 85.
procedures: Talk to Yulete at Magatia: Yulete's Lab, located in the sewer in Sunset Road: Magatia.

Provide Yulete with
25 Zenumist Marble and 25 Alcadno Marble to get the Eye of Horus
OR
10 Zenumist Marble and 10 Alcadno Marble to get the Rock of Wisdom.

chain.name: Tae Soo's Account
procedures: Talk to Tae Soo in Mu Lung: Peach Farm 1.
Go to Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple and talk to No Gong.

chain.name: No Gong's Student
procedures: Talk to No Gong in Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Next, talk to Do Gong.

chain.name: Do Gong's Spell
procedures: Talk to Do Gong in Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Hunt for 10 Old Paper from The Book Ghost.
Hunt for 10 Broken Deer Horn from Reindeer.
Hunt for 50 Peach Seed from Peach Monkey.
Return to him after you have collected all of the items.

chain.name: Defeat Tae Roon
procedures: Talk to No Gong in Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Eliminate 1 Tae Roon.
Return to him after you have completed the task.

chain.name: Tae Sooâ€™s Reward
rewards: Dropping 1 Peach on the stone bench and receiving 1 Tae Roon's Note is repeatable.
procedures: Head over to Mu Lung: Peach Farm 1 and talk to Tae Soo.
You will obtain 1 Tae Soo's Peach from him.
Next, go to Mu Lung: Wild Bear Area 1 and drop the obtained item on the stone bench, just as shown in the image below.
1 Tae Roon's Note will appear. Pick up the item and bring it to Tae Soo.

chain.name: What De Lang Wants
procedures: Talk to Parwen at Hidden Street: Authorized Personnel Only.
You will be brought to the same area as Dr. De Lang was before, so talk to him.

chain.name: De Lang's Potion
procedures: Talk to Dr. De Lang.
Then talk to Maed at Magatia: Alcadno Society.

chain.name: The Memories of Humanoid A
procedures: Talk to Maed at Magatia: Alcadno Society.
Then talk to Humanoid A in Sunset Road: Magatia.

chain.name: Who is De Lang?
procedures: Talk to Humanoid A in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Receive Unknown Medicine from him, then return to Maed and talk to him.

chain.name: De Lang and Humanoid A
rewards: Scroll for Cape for Magic Def 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for Weapon Def 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for HP 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for MP 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for STR 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for DEX 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for INT 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for LUK 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Maed at Magatia: Alcadno Society.
Go and talk to Keeny in Sunset Road: Magatia.

chain.name: For Zenumist
rewards: Cannot get this quest if For Alcadno or For Phyllia has been started.
procedures: Talk to Carson at Magatia: Zenumist Society.
Pass to him Dran's Note and Zenumist's Cape.

chain.name: For Alcadno
rewards: Cannot get this quest if For Zenumist or For Phyllia has been started.
procedures: Talk to Maed at Magatia: Alcadno Society.
Pass to him Dran's Note and Alcadno's Cape.

chain.name: For Phyllia
rewards: Cannot get this quest if For Zenumist or For Alcadno has been started.
procedures: Talk to Phyllia in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Pass her Dran's Note.

chain.name: Re-acquiring Dr. De Lang's Notes
rewards: Only available if For Zenumist, For Alcadno, or For Phyllia has been started and Dran's Note is not in your inventory.
procedures: Talk to Alcaster in El Nath: El Nath Market repeatedly.

chain.name: Weakening King Sage Cat
procedures: Talk to Do Gong in Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Hunt for 100 Cat Doll from Sage Cat.
Return to Do Gong and pass him the items.

chain.name: Master Goblin's Call
procedures: Talk to Do Gong in Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Go to Mu Lung: Goblin Forest 1.  You will automatically receive a notice from Maple Administrator.
Proceed to Mu Lung: Goblin Forest 2 then through the portal on the right to Hidden Street: Forest of the Ghost Priest.
Talk to Master Goblin.

chain.name: Do Gong's in Trouble
procedures: Talk to Master Goblin in Hidden Street: Forest of the Ghost Priest.  You will gain 1 Red Marble.
Return to Do Gong and give him the item.

chain.name: Master Goblin's Questions
rewards: Note that there are two answers to each question.  These are the only answers that have been tested.  If you try the other answers and there is different outcome, please email HiddenStreet with your find!
procedures: Go back to Master Goblin in Hidden Street: Forest of the Ghost Priest.

Answer his 3 questions:

...
...
 No way...
No way...

chain.name: Eliminating King Sage Cat
procedures: Talk to Do Gong in Mu Lung: Mu Lung Temple.
Return to Mu Lung: Goblin Forest 1 and defeat King Sage Cat.
Pick up the Antidote Marble that he drops.
Return to Do Gong and give him the item.

chain.name: Soul in the Dark
rewards: Dark Scroll for Bottomwear for Jump 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Cape for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Earring for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Earring for INT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Gloves for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Gloves for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Shoes for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Shoes for Jump 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Shoes for Speed 30% x 1
procedures: Talk to Jayin Henesys.
Hunt for 50 Free Spirit from Master Soul Teddy.
Talk to Jay again after you have collected the items.

name: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest

chain.name: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest 1
procedures: Talk to Grendel the Really Old at Victoria Road: Magic Library.

chain.name: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest 2
procedures: Talk to Grendel the Really Old at Victoria Road: Magic Library.
Deliver the Pure Water of Protection to Chief Tatamo at Leafre.

chain.name: The Committee Challanges
procedures: Talk to Sabitrama in Sleepywood.
Hunt for 200 Lazy Buffy's Marble from Lazy Buffy.
Talk to Sabitrama again once you have collected the items.

chain.name: The Father of Modern Science
rewards: Dark Scroll for Gloves for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Gloves for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 30% x 1
procedures: Talk to Sabitramain Sleepywood.
Talk to Dr. Kim in Omega Sector: Command Center.
Hunt for 500 Dual Pirate's Propeller from Dual Ghost Pirate.
Talk to Dr. Kim again once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Sabitrama's Life Work
rewards: Dark Scroll for Gloves for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 30% x 1
procedures: Talk to Sabitrama in Sleepywood.
Hunt for 100 Stone Golem Rubble from Stone Golem.
Hunt for 100 Dark Stone Golem Rubble from Dark Stone Golem.
Hunt for 100 Sealed Teddy Bear from Death Teddy.
Talk to Sabitrama again once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Open Sesame
rewards: Dark Scroll for Topwear for STR 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Bottomwear for Jump 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for LUK 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for DEF 30% x 1
procedures: Talk to Sabitrama in Sleepywood.
Pay him 1,000,000 mesos.

chain.name: An Unknown Love
rewards: Dark Scroll for Gloves for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 30% x 1
procedures: Talk to Jane Doe in Kerning City.
Hunt for 100 Binding Bridle from Master Death Teddy.
Talk to Jane Doe again once you have collected the items.

chain.name: The Ghost Whereabouts
procedures: Talk to Jay in Henesys.
Go to Zipangu: Showa Town and talk to Sakura.

chain.name: A Puppet
procedures: Go back to Henesys and talk to Jay.

chain.name: The Man of Convention
rewards: Dark Scroll for Cape for LUK 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Shield for LUK 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 30% x 1
procedures: Hunt for 50 Sealed Teddy Bear from Death Teddy.
Hunt for 50 Binding Bridle from Master Death Teddy.
Talk to Sakura in Zipangu: Showa Town once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Ray of Light
rewards: Dark Scroll for Bow for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Claw for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Dagger for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Gloves for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Spear for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Gun for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 30% x 1
procedures: Return to Henesys and talk to Jay.

chain.name: Monster Riding
procedures: Talk to Kenta in Aquarium: Zoo.
Talk to Kenta again and select the option "I would like to start off to protect the Pig". There will be a time limit of 5 minutes to complete the tasks.
Collect 5 Pheromone which are dropped randomly by the Pig.
Collect 5 Kenta's Report by hitting the chests found in the map.
Once you have collected the items, talk to Kenta found in the map.
Talk to Kenta once again to receive your rewards.

chain.name: Ominous Sign
procedures: Talk to Shammos at El Nath: Chief's Residence.

chain.name: Confirming the Seal
procedures: Talk to Robeira at El Nath: Chief's Residence.

Head over to El Nath: Ice Valley II, then access Ice Ravine: Ice Ravine Entrance from there. You will have to navigate to the next subsequent maps up to Ice Ravine: Ice Ravine 5, from which you'll have to enter Ice Ravine: Ancient Ice Cave.
Once you have confirmed the seal, return and talk to Shammos at El Nath: Chief's Residence.

chain.name: Sign Of The Resurrection
procedures: Talk to Robeira at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Talk to Shammos at El Nath: Chief's Residence.

chain.name: Robeira's Proposal
procedures: Talk to Shammos at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Talk to Robeira at El Nath: Chief's Residence.

chain.name: Evidence Of The Seal
procedures: Talk to Robeira at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Kill 1 Rex at Ice Ravine: Ancient Ice Cave and obtain Essence of the Hoblin King.
Return to El Nath: Chief's Residence and talk to Robeira.

chain.name: Preparing For The Extreme
procedures: Talk to Robeira at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Hunt for 10 Coal Dust at Coolie Zombie.
Obtain 1 Steel Plate.
Obtain 1 Pure Water.
Return to Robeira at El Nath: Chief's Residence.

chain.name: Supplying Leather Clothes
procedures: Talk to Pedro at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Hunt for 10 Elite Hoblin Outfit from Elite Hoblin.
Head back to El Nath: Chief's Residence and talk to Pedro.

chain.name: Hoblin Weapon
procedures: Talk to Tylus at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Hunt for 1 Hoblin Mace from Ferocious Hoblin.
Return to El Nath: Chief's Residence and talk to Tylus.

chain.name: Secret To Improving Concentration
procedures: Talk to Rene at El Nath: Chief's Residence.
Hunt for 10 Elite Green Hoblin Charm from Elite Green Hoblin.
Head back to El Nath: Chief's Residence and talk to Rene.

chain.name: Monster Rumor Mill
procedures: Talk to Scadur in El Nath.
Then talk to Master Sergeant Fox  who is also in El Nath.

chain.name: Fox So Foxy
procedures: Talk to Master Sergeant Fox  in El Nath.
Hunt for 50 Lazy Buffy's Marble from Lazy Buffy.
Return to Master Sergeant Fox  after you have collected the item.

chain.name: Lycanthrope
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Speed 100% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 10% x 1
procedures: Talk to General Maestro in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 50 Lycanthrope's Toenail from Lycanthrope.
Return to General Maestro after you have collected the item.

name: The Blocked Path of the Ocean

chain.name: Carta the Sea Witch
procedures: Talk to Muse in Aquarium: Zoo.
Search for Carta in Aqua Road: Carta's Cave and talk to her.

chain.name: Carta's Demand
procedures: Hunt for 10 Sea Dust by hitting the chest.
Hunt for 1 Pianus's Scream from Pianus.
Hunt for 3 Cold Tear from Bone Fish.
Return to Carta after you have collected all the items.

chain.name: Carta's Fortune-Telling
procedures: Head back to Muse and talk to her.

chain.name: Muse is Cooking
rewards: Scroll for Gloves for ATT 10% x 1
procedures: You will obtain 1 Muse's Dish from Muse after completing Nanuke's Ingredients.
Go to Aqua Road: Snowy Whale's Island and talk to Nanuke to hand over the obtained item.

chain.name: Ito's Request
procedures: Talk to Ito in Leafre.
Hunt for 55 Rash's Furball from Rash.
Hunt for 75 Dark Rash's Furball from Dark Rash.
Talk to Ito again once you have collected all of the items.

chain.name: The Suspicious Wanderer
procedures: Talk to Han the Broker at Sunset Road: Magatia and pay him 5,000 mesos.
Then talk to Syras at Ariant: Ariant Station Platform.

chain.name: The Wanderer's Whereabouts 1             (Level 70 and above)
procedures: Talk to Syras at Ariant: Ariant Station Platform.
Then talk to Isa the Station Guide at Orbis: Orbis Station Enterence.

chain.name: The Wanderer's Whereabouts 2             (Level 70 and above)
procedures: Talk to Isa the Station Guide at Orbis: Orbis Station Enterence.
Then talk to Andy at Tera Forest: Tera Forest Time Gate, which can be accessed by going to the top-right portal of Leafre: Minar Forest : East Border.

chain.name: Andy the Time Traveler             (Level 70 and above)
procedures: Talk to Andy at Tera Forest: Tera Forest Time Gate.
Hunt for 1 Andy's Pocket Watch from the monsters in Minar Forest.
Return and talk to Andy.

chain.name: Nex the Time Guard             (Level 70 and above)
procedures: Talk to Andy at Tera Forest: Tera Forest Time Gate.
Kill 1 Gatekeeper Nex at Tera Forest: Old Tree in Tera Forest.
Return and talk to Andy.

chain.name: The First Clue             (Level 70 and above)
procedures: Talk to Andy at Tera Forest: Tera Forest Time Gate.
Hunt for 1 Primary Clue to the Case by attacking the trash cans in the maps of the Year 2021.
Return and talk to Andy.

chain.name: Dangerous Slimes             (Level 71 and above)
procedures: Talk to Brainy Boy at Neo City: <Year 2021> Average Town Entrance.
Hunt for 30 Red Squishy Liquid from Red Slime [2], 30 Silver Squishy Liquid from Silver Slime, and 30 Gold Squishy Liquid from Gold Slime.
Kill 50 Red Slime [2], 50 Silver Slime, and 50 Gold Slime.
Return and talk to Brainy Boy.

chain.name: The Crying Girl's Sketchbook             (Level 72 and above)
procedures: Talk to Crying Girl at Neo City: <Year 2021> Average Town Entrance.
Hunt for 20 Wrinkled Sketchbook Loose-Leaf from Red Slime [2], Silver Slime, or Gold Slime.
Return and talk to Crying Girl.

chain.name: The Boy and the Girl             (Level 72 and above)
procedures: Talk to Brainy Boy at Neo City: <Year 2021> Average Town Entrance.
Then talk to Andy at Tera Forest: Tera Forest Time Gate.

chain.name: Kumo's Request
procedures: Talk to Kumoin Leafre.
Hunt for 48 Beetle's Horn from Beetle.
Hunt for 28 Dual Beetle's Horn from Dual Beetle.
Talk to Kumo again once you have collected all the items.

chain.name: Pam's Request
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Jump 10% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Jump 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 10% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Pam in Leafre.
Hunt for 50 Hankie's Panfluit from Hankie.
Talk to Pam again once you have collected the items.

chain.name: The Last Hour of Horntail
rewards: I believe this is part of the party quest you must complete before attempting to fight Horntail's Head B.
procedures: Talk to Moira in Leafre: Cave of Life - Entrance.
Kill 1 Horned Tail.
Talk to Moira again once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Moira's Whereabouts
procedures: Talk to Chief Tatamo in Leafre.
Go to Leafre: Cave of Life - Entrance and talk to Moira.

chain.name: Secret Medicine for Transformation                      repeatable
rewards:
Reward(s) (if quest is repeated):

30,000 exp
1 Dragon Elixir
This quest is repeatable once every hour.
procedures: Talk to Moira in Leafre: Cave of Life - Entrance.
Hunt for 10 Tough Dragon Skin from Dark Wyvern.
Hunt for 1 Cornian's Dagger by forging it with Mos with the following items: 1 Steel Plate, 1 Mithril Plate and 1 Busted Dagger from Dark Cornian..
Hunt for 1 Cornian's Marrow.
Hunt for 1 Manon's Cry from Manon.
Hunt for 1 Skull Shoulder Pad from Dark Cornian.
Talk to Moira after you have collected all of the items.

chain.name: Yaku's Request
procedures: Talk to Yaku in Leafre.
Hunt for 50 Harp's Tail Feather from Harp.
Hunt for 30 Blood Harp's Crown from Blood Harp.
Talk to Yaku again once you have collected all the items.

name: The Sacred Barrier of the Forest

chain.name: Red Tree
procedures: Talk to Yaku in Leafre.
Talk to Chief Tatamo who is also in Leafre.

chain.name: Getting Advice from Grendel the Really Old 1
procedures: After obtaining Tatamo's Letter, go to Ellinia and talk to Grendel the Really Old.

chain.name: Getting Advice from Grendel the Really Old 2
procedures: Hunt for 5 Kentaurus's Flame from Red Kentaurus.
Hunt for 5 Kentaurus's Marrow from Blue Kentaurus.
Hunt for 5 Kentaurus's Skull from Black Kentaurus.
Go to Chief Tatamo in Leafre after you have collected all the items.

chain.name: Recipe for the Medicine
procedures: Talk to Pam in Leafre.
Hunt for 80 Birk's Chewed Grass from Birk.
Talk to Pam again after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Recovering the Black Spirit
procedures: Talk to Raul the Knight in Leafre: Wyvern Canyon.
Hunt for 1 Black Soul of Dark Rash.
Hunt for 1 Black Soul of Dual Birk.
Hunt for 1 Black Soul of Dark Cornian.
Hunt for 1 Black Soul of Dark Wyvern.
Go to Leafre: Cave of Life - Entrance and talk to Moira after you have collected all of the items.

chain.name: Wyvern's Sudden Attack
procedures: Talk to Raul the Knight in Leafre: Wyvern Canyon.
Kill 18 Red Wyvern.
Kill 18 Blue Wyvern.
Kill 18 Dark Wyvern.
Talk to Raul the Knight again after you have completed these tasks.

chain.name: Lost in Translation 1
procedures: Look for Jack in Crimsonwood Mountain: Cavern of Pain and talk to him.
You will obtain 1 Coded Communique.
Bring the obtained item to John Barricade in Bigger Ben: Lobby.

chain.name: Lost in Translation 2
procedures: Talk to John Barricade in Bigger Ben: Lobby.
In New Leaf City Town Street: New Leaf City - Town Center, talk to Elpam Gorlab.

chain.name: Lost in Translation 3
procedures: Return to John Barricade in Bigger Ben: Lobby and talk to him.
Head over to Crimsonwood Mountain: Cavern of Pain and talk to Jack.

chain.name: Stemming the Tide
procedures: Talk to Jack in Crimsonwood Mountain: Cavern of Pain.
Head over to Phantom Forest: Phantom Road and talk to Lukan.  You will then initiate the Storming the Castle quest.
Once you have finished the Storming the Castle quest, return to Jack.

chain.name: Storming the Castle
procedures: Talk to Lukan in Phantom Forest: Phantom Road.
Eliminate 75 Windraider.
Eliminate 75 Firebrand [2].
Eliminate 75 Nightshadow.
Return to him after you have completed the tasks.

chain.name: Mark of Heroism
procedures: Talk to Lukan in Phantom Forest: Phantom Road.
Go to Bigger Ben: Lobby and talk to John Barricade.
Collect 10 Gold Ore.
Hunt for 4 Typhon Feather from Baby Typhon or Typhon.
Collect 1 Power Crystal Ore.
Return to John Barricade after you have collected the items.

chain.name: The Fallen Warriors
procedures: Talk to Taggrin in Phantom Forest: Dead Man's Gorge.
Hunt for 50 Elder Ashes from Elderwraith.
Return to him with the collected items.

name: What the Yellow King Goblin Wants

chain.name: What the Yellow King Goblin Wants
procedures: Head over to Hidden Street: Goblin House and talk to Yellow King Goblin.
Acquire 1 Roasted Pork beforehand and give it to him.

name: What the Green King Goblin Wants

chain.name: What the Green King Goblin Wants
procedures: Head over to Hidden Street: Goblin House and talk to Green King Goblin.
Acquire 1 Buckwheat Paste beforehand and give it to him.

name: What the Blue King Goblin Wants

chain.name: What the Blue King Goblin Wants
procedures: Head over to Hidden Street: Goblin House and talk to Blue King Goblin.
Acquire 1 Rice Wine beforehand and give it to him.

chain.name: Young Man Possessed by a Fox             (Level 70 and above)
procedures: Look for Chil Sung in Korean Folk Town and talk to him.
Talk to Chil Nam.

chain.name: Chil Sung's Request             (Level 70 and above)
procedures: Talk to Chil Sung again in Korean Folk Town.
Hunt for 1 Small Clue from Samiho.

chain.name: Fox's Threat
procedures: Head over to Korean Folk Town: A Small Well and talk to God of Mountains.
Obtain 1 Rice Wine by completing Kong Ji's Rice Wine.
Obtain 1 Buckwheat Paste by completing Chil Nam's Buckwheat Paste.
Obtain 1 Roasted Pork by completing Chil Sung's Roasted Pork.
Head down to Hidden Street: Goblin House and talk to Yellow King Goblin, Green King Goblin and Blue King Goblin.

Complete the following quest:
- What the Yellow King Goblin Wants
- What the Green King Goblin Wants
- What the Blue King Goblin Wants
Once the three quests are completed, talk to God of Mountains.
chain.npcLocation: Korean Folk Town: A Small Well

chain.name: Retrieve a Soul
procedures: Go to Korean Folk Town and talk to Chil Sung.
Defeat 1 Nine-Tailed Fox at Korean Folk Town: Moon Ridge to acquire the Old Fox's Tail.
Once you have obtain the item, talk to Chil Nam.

chain.name: The Binding
procedures: Search for Ghosthunter Bob in Ludibrium: Forgotten Path of Time <1>.
Hunt for 20 Binding Bridle from Master Death Teddy.
Return to Ghosthunter Bob once you have collected the item.

chain.name: The Soul Collector
rewards: This quest is repeatable once every 24 hours.
procedures: Search for Ghosthunter Bob in Ludibrium: Forgotten Path of Time <1>.
Hunt for 1 Soul Collector from Spirit Viking.
Kill 20 Spirit Viking.
Return to Ghosthunter Bob once you have collected the item.

chain.name: Entering Ulu City             (Level 70 and above)          repeatable
procedures: Talk to Ralph the Wanderer at Singapore: Boat Quay Town.
Hunt 50 Veetron, 50 Berserkie and 30 Montrecer.
Collect 50 Veetron Horn from Veetron.
Collect 50 Sweat Bead from Berserkie.
Collect 30 Oil Canister from Montrecer.
Head to Singapore: Ulu City Entrance and talk to Commando Jim

chain.name: Pushing Forward In Ulu City             (Level 70 and above)          repeatable
procedures: Talk to Commando Jim at Singapore: Ulu City Entrance.
Kill 100 Slygie and 100 Petrifighter.
Collect 100 Slygie Tail from Slygie.
Collect 100 Moss Rock from Petrifighter.
Return to Singapore: Ulu City Entrance and talk to Commando Jim.

chain.name: Ulu City Energy Thieves             (Level 70 and above)          repeatable
rewards: Scroll for Spear for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Bow for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Claw for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for Earring for INT 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for STR 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for INT 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for LUK 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for DEX 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Commando Jim at Singapore: Ulu City Entrance.
Kill 100 Duku.
Collect 100 Rafflesia from Duku.
Collect 1 Soul Lantern from Capt. Latanica.

chain.name: Savior Of Ulu City [2]             (Level 70 and above)          repeatable
rewards: Dark Korben x 1 if you are a Warrior
Blue Ciara x 1 if you are a Magician
Green Arcina x 1 if you are a Bowman
Dark Anelin x 1 if you are a Thief
procedures: Talk to Commando Jim at Singapore: Ulu City Entrance.
Kill 1 Krexel [3].
Return to Commando Jim at Singapore: Ulu City Entrance.

chain.name: Present for Brother
procedures: Speak to Lam in Kampung Village
Kill 200 Booper Scarlion
Hunt for 200 Toy Plane from Booper Scarlion
Return to Lam

chain.name: Merry-go-round in Kampung
procedures: Speak to Lam in Kampung Village
Kill 200 Gallopera
Hunt for 200 Wooden Pony Tail from Gallopera
Return to Lam

chain.name: Lam Wants To See the World             (Level 85 and above)
rewards: Dark Scroll for Cape for INT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Cape for DEX 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Bow for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Claw for ATT 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Shield for Magic Att 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Shield for Weapon Att 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Gloves for Magic Att. 30% x 1
Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for INT 30% x 1
procedures: Speak to Lam in Malaysia: Kampung Village.
Hunt for 100 Lucky Bus Ticket from Yabber Doo.
Return to Lam.

chain.name: Off to the City             (Level 85 and above)
procedures: Talk to Lam in Malaysia: Kampung Village.
Hunt 200 Viking Helmet from Vikerola.
Kill 200 Vikerola.
Return to Lam.

chain.name: Gift for Brother             (Level 85 and above)
procedures: Talk to Lam in Malaysia: Kampung Village.
Hunt 200 Toy Plane from Booper Scarlion.
Kill 200 Booper Scarlion.
Return to Lam.

chain.name: Merry-go-round in Kampung             (Level 85 and above)
procedures: Talk to Lam in Malaysia: Kampung Village.
Hunt 200 Wooden Pony Tail from Gallopera.
Kill 200 Gallopera.
Return to Lam.

chain.name: Gift for Dear Daddy
procedures: Talk to [node:8177 link] in Malaysia: Outskirts of Muddy Banks.
Eliminate 100 Charmer.
Obtain 100 Charmer's Flute.
Return to Hurliza and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Daddy's Birthday Party
procedures: Talk to [node:8177 link] in Malaysia: Outskirts of Muddy Banks.
Eliminate 50 Ratatula.
Obtain 50 Tall Hat.
Return to Hurliza and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Unexpected Guest
procedures: Talk to Hurliza in Malaysia: Outskirts of Muddy Banks.
Eliminate 100 Froscola.
Obtain 100 Lucky Hat.
Return to Hurliza and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Grand Finale             (Level 85 and above)
procedures: Talk to Hurliza in Malaysia: Outskirts of Muddy Banks.
Eliminate 200 Jester Scarlion.
Obtain 200 Dented Barrel.
Return to Hurliza and give her the collected items.

name: Off to the Fantasy Theme Park

chain.name: Off to the Fantasy Theme Park
rewards: Spirit of Fantasy Theme Park x 1
procedures: Talk to Lam in Malaysia: Kampung Village.
Hunt for 10 Rodeo's Master.
Return to Lam.
You may place the Spirit of Fantasy Theme Park under the statue of the Scarlion Boss [1] or Targa [1] to summon them.

chain.name: Path to the Past
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.

name: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane 1
The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane 2

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane 2
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.
Kill 999 Memory Monk Trainee.
Talk to Temple Keeper again.

name: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane 3

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane 3
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.
Kill 999 Memory Guardian.
Talk to Temple Keeper again.

name: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane 4

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane 4
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.
Kill 999 Chief Memory Guardian.
Talk to Temple Keeper again.

name: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane 5

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane 5
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.
Kill 1 Dodo.
Talk to Temple Keeper again.

name: In Search for the Lost Memory

chain.name: In Search for the Lost Memory
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.
Talk to Memory Keeper.

chain.name: Memory Lane
procedures: Talk to Memory Keeper.
Talk to your 1st job advancement NPC.
Talk to Memory Keeper.

name: The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets 1

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets 1
rewards: Allows access to Road of Regrets 2.
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.
Kill 999 Qualm Monk.
Talk to Temple Keeper again.

name: The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets 2
The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets 3

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets 3
rewards: Allows access to Road of Regrets 4.
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.

rewards: Allows access to Road of Regrets 5.
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.

Talk to Temple Keeper again.

chain.name: Frozen Emotions
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper at Time Lane: Three Doors.
Talk to Sorcerer at Time Lane: Sorcerer's Room.

name: The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets 5

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets 5
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.
Kill 1 Lilynouch.
Talk to Temple Keeper again.

chain.name: The Sorcerer Who Sells Emotions
procedures: Talk to Sorcerer in Time Lane: Sorcerer's Room.
Pay 1,000,000 mesos to obtain 1 Sorcerer's Potion.
Drink the Sorcerer's Potion. Player will die upon drinking. Click Ok to revive, but do not heal.
Talk to Sorcerer again to finish the quest.

name: The One Who Walks Down the Road to Oblivion 1

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down the Road to Oblivion 1
rewards: Allows access to Road to Oblivion 2
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.
Kill 999 Oblivion Monk.
Talk to Temple Keeper again.

name: The One Who Walks Down the Road to Oblivion 2

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down the Road to Oblivion 2
rewards: Allows access to Road to Oblivion 3
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.

Talk to Temple Keeper again.

chain.name: The One Who Walks Down the Road to Oblivion 3
rewards: Allows access to Road to Oblivion 4
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.

procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper.

Talk to Temple Keeper again.

chain.name: Goddess's Blessing
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper at Time Lane: Three Doors.
Talk to Record Keeper at Time Lane: Record Keeper's Room

chain.name: Barrier
procedures: Talk to Record Keeper at Time Lane: Record Keeper's Room.
Talk to Temple Keeper at Time Lane: Three Doors.
Obtain 10 of each Smiley Mask, Neutral Mask and Frowny Mask from the Monks/Monk Trainees in their respective areas.
Obtain one of each Whale's Helmet, Knight's Mask and Guardian's Horn from each of the three bosses in their respective areas.
Talk to Temple Keeper again.

chain.name: Breaking the Barrier again
rewards: This quest is repeatable whenever Marble of Chaos is not in your inventory.
procedures: Talk to Temple Keeper at Time Lane: Three Doors.
Obtain 10 of each Smiley Mask, Neutral Mask and Frowny Mask from the Monks/Monk Trainees in their respective areas.
Obtain one of each Whale's Helmet, Knight's Mask and Guardian's Horn from each of the three bosses in their respective areas.
Talk to Temple Keeper again.
